data.title: giallo
data.meta_description: giallo - translate into English with the Italian-English Dictionary - Cambridge Dictionary
data.text:
adjective

/'dʒalːo/

● (di colore)

yellow

maglia gialla yellow shirt

farina gialla cornmeal

pagine gialle trademark

the yellow pages

● (poliziesco)

mystery , crime story , detective story

film / libro giallo detective movie/book

giallo

noun

[ masculine ]

● (colore)

yellow

giallo oro yellow gold

il giallo dell’uovo

egg yolk

● (opera)

mystery , crime story , detective story

i gialli di Hitchcock Hitchcock’s mysteries

(Translation of giallo from the GLOBAL Italian–English Dictionary © 2018 K Dictionaries Ltd)

Translation of giallo | PASSWORD Italian–English Dictionary

giallo

adjective, noun

yellow [adjective, noun] (of) the colour/color of gold, the yolk of an egg etc

(Translation of giallo from the PASSWORD Italian–English Dictionary © 2014 K Dictionaries Ltd)
